data.actual_result: The role cannot be found in the roles list when attempting to add a role to either yourself or someone else. It won't show up until you put a name to it.
data.expected_result: The role will be visible and can be added to anyone.
data.short_description: You can set spaces in a role name
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role and put at least 5 spaces in the name - Save changes and proceed to add the role to yourself or someone else.
